CATEGORIES.TITLE: Choose the Motorcycle Category
CATEGORIES.DESCRIPTION: Find the perfect category that suits your style and needs.

TOURING.DESCRIPTION: Motorcycles designed for long-distance trips with comfort and stability.
TOURING.IDEAL_USER: People who love traveling long distances and value comfort on highways.

CUSTOM.DESCRIPTION: Motorcycles with customizable designs, classic style, and low seat height.
CUSTOM.IDEAL_USER: Design enthusiasts who seek a unique and personalized motorcycle.

SPORT.DESCRIPTION: High-performance motorcycles focused on speed, aerodynamics, and maneuverability.

TRAIL.DESCRIPTION: Designed for off-road adventures with reinforced suspension and tires for rough terrain.
TRAIL.IDEAL_USER: Adventurers who enjoy exploring trails and challenging terrains.

NAKED.DESCRIPTION: Urban motorcycles with a minimalist design and agile handling, without fairings.
NAKED.IDEAL_USER: Urban riders who prioritize practicality and style.

SCOOTER.DESCRIPTION: Small and practical motorcycles, ideal for short trips and fuel efficiency.
SCOOTER.IDEAL_USER: Commuters seeking economy and ease in traffic.
